Content-transfer-encoding: 8BIT

URI's that hit crawledURINeedRetry(CrawlURI curi) in 
StatisticsTracker.java because of prerequisits still missing (dns: & 
robots.txt) are using from the queue-budget !!

So if you the a queue-total-budget to 50 something around 45-48 objects 
will typically be fetched

Could such URI's not use from the budget ?? (since they are never 
fetched but just put back on the URI-queue)

We use the queue-total-budget in all crawls and want it to be as 
accurate as possible

best
